title: Aloo shimla mirch (Indian potatoes and peppers)
ingredients: ['2 large potatoes', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon cumin seeds', '1 teaspoon kalonji (nigella seeds)', '2 large onions, chopped', '1 to 2 green peppers, chopped', '1 green chilli, halved', '4 to 6 fresh curry leaves', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '2 large tomatoes, finely chopped', '2 teaspoons chilli powder', '2 teaspoons ground cumin', '2 teaspoons ground coriander', 'salt to taste', '1 handful fresh coriander leaves']
